title: There's only one reason to watch this ...
review: ... and, presumably, part 2: Sophia Tillis. If you're male and disagree, you're lying. Unfortunately, Beverly as a 'bad girl' wasn't in the book or the series. The other kids all looked so much alike I couldn't tell them apart - except for Mike and, maybe, Ben. But even those two seemed to blend into a blur.I will watch part 2, but only when I won't have to pay too much, just to see if grown up Beverly has the cringe-worthy line from the series: 'Why is It so mean?!'
